files.name: .gitignore
files.content:
# Byte-compiled / optimized / DLL files
__pycache__/
*.py[cod]
*$py.class
.idea
# C extensions
*.so

.DS_Store
.idea
migrations
# Distribution / packaging
.Python
build/
develop-eggs/
dist/
downloads/
eggs/
.eggs/
lib/
lib64/
parts/
sdist/
var/
wheels/
*.egg-info/
.installed.cfg
*.egg
MANIFEST

# PyInstaller
#  Usually these files are written by a python script from a template
#  before PyInstaller builds the exe, so as to inject date/other infos into it.
*.manifest
*.spec

# Installer logs
pip-log.txt
pip-delete-this-directory.txt

# Unit test / coverage reports
htmlcov/
.tox/
.coverage
.coverage.*
.cache
nosetests.xml
coverage.xml
*.cover
.hypothesis/
.pytest_cache/

# Translations
*.mo
*.pot

# Django stuff:
*.log
local_settings.py
db.sqlite3

# Flask stuff:
instance/
.webassets-cache

# Scrapy stuff:
.scrapy

# Sphinx documentation
docs/_build/

# PyBuilder
target/

# Jupyter Notebook
.ipynb_checkpoints

# pyenv
.python-version

# celery beat schedule file
celerybeat-schedule

# SageMath parsed files
*.sage.py

# Environments
.env
.venv
env/
venv/
ENV/
env.bak/
mohit pathak

# Spyder project settings
.spyderproject
.spyproject

# Rope project settings
.ropeproject

# mkdocs documentation
/site

# mypy
.mypy_cache/

files.name: MANIFEST.in
files.content:
recursive-include simpleui/ *
recursive-include simpleui/static *
recursive-include simpleui/templates *
recursive-include simpleui/templatetags *

files.content:

ç¤¾åŒº | æ–‡æ¡£ | Documents

--- simpleui ç‰¹ç‚¹ ----- ğŸ‘ å†…ç½®28æ¬¾æµè¡Œçš„ä¸»é¢˜ âš¡ï¸ pipé—ªç”µå®‰è£…100%å…¼å®¹åŸç”Ÿadminæ— éœ€ä¿®æ”¹ä»£ç  âœ¨ å¤šæ ‡ç­¾é¡µé¢ï¼Œå„ä¸ªæ¨¡å—æ›´åŠ æ¸…æ™°æ˜äº† ğŸ¯ é…ç½®ç®€å•ï¼Œæé€Ÿä¸Šæ‰‹ï¼Œåœ¨settings.pyä¸­åŠ å…¥simpleuiåå¯åŠ¨ç«‹å³ç”Ÿæ•ˆï¼Œæ•ˆç‡æå‡ 100%ï¼è®©åç«¯å¼€å‘å¾—å¿ƒåº”æ‰‹ã€‚ â˜•ï¸ Element-UI + Vue åŠ æŒï¼Œè®©å¤è€çš„django admin ç„•ç„¶ä¸€æ–°ã€‚ ğŸ¦€ æ–°å¢æ”¯æŒDjango3.0ï¼ŒPython3.8ã€Python3.9ï¼Œæ•¢äºåšç¬¬ä¸€ä¸ªåƒèƒèŸ¹çš„äººã€‚ # å¼€å‘åˆè¡· Django Adminé»˜è®¤ç•Œé¢è®¾è®¡è¯­è¨€å­˜åœ¨ç€çš„ä¸€äº›ä¸è¶³ï¼Œæ¯”å¦‚è‰²å½©å•ä¸€ï¼Œå¤§é‡çº¿æ¡çš„ä½¿ç”¨ï¼Œåˆ†å‰²åŒ–æ˜æ˜¾ã€‚å°†è¿™äº›ä¸è¶³å½’ç±»ä¸€ä¸‹å°±æ˜¯ç•Œé¢å•è°ƒã€é›·åŒæ€§æ˜æ˜¾ã€ç¼ºå°‘æƒŠå–œã€‚æˆ‘ä»¬è®¤ä¸ºæ–°çš„å¹³å°ç±»è§†è§‰é£æ ¼å¯ä»¥æ‰“ç ´è¿™äº›æŸç¼šï¼Œå°è¯•ä¸€äº›æ–°çš„æ¢ç´¢ï¼Œå¯å‘ä¼ ç»Ÿçš„è®¾è®¡è®¤çŸ¥,å› æ­¤ç»“åˆå½“ä¸‹è®¾è®¡è¶‹åŠ¿ï¼Œæ„æ€äº†Element+Django Adminçš„Simpleuiã€‚è®©Django Adminå’ŒElementäº§ç”Ÿå®Œç¾çš„äº¤äº’ã€‚é…ä»¥æœ€æµè¡Œçš„åå°è®¾è®¡é£æ ¼ï¼Œè®©Django Adminæ›´åŠ å¼ºå¤§ã€‚ ## QQç¾¤ + QQç¾¤å·:722755389 + QQç¾¤å·:747695956 + QQç¾¤å·:873469913(æ»¡) + QQç¾¤å·:786576510(æ»¡) > æˆ‘ä»¬æ¨èåœ¨[çŒ¿å †å †ç¤¾åŒº](https://www.mldoo.com)æé—®ï¼Œæ–¹ä¾¿ä»¥åå¤§å®¶æœ‰é—®é¢˜çš„æ—¶å€™ç›´æ¥æŸ¥æ‰¾ã€‚ ## ä¸“ä¸šç‰ˆ > å¦‚æœå…è´¹ç‰ˆæ— æ³•æ»¡è¶³æ‚¨çš„éœ€æ±‚ï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬è¿˜æä¾›äº†ä¸€ä¸ªåŠŸèƒ½æ›´å¼ºå¤§çš„proç‰ˆï¼Œå¯ä»¥æ»¡è¶³æ›´å¤šçš„éœ€æ±‚ > æä¾›äº†æ•°åä¸ªè‡ªå®šä¹‰ç»„ä»¶+æ‹–æ‹½å¼é¦–é¡µè®¾è®¡å’Œå›¾è¡¨è®¾è®¡ Demoï¼š[https://www.mldoo.com/demo/simplepro](https://www.mldoo.com/demo/simplepro) å®˜ç½‘ï¼š[https://www.mldoo.com/simplepro](https://www.mldoo.com/docs/simplepro) ## æ–‡æ¡£ æ–‡æ¡£è¯¦ç»†çš„æè¿°äº†å®‰è£…ä½¿ç”¨æ–¹æ³•ï¼Œä»¥åŠå„ç§é…ç½®é¡¹çš„è¯´æ˜ï¼Œè¯·ç‚¹å‡»ä»¥ä¸‹é“¾æ¥æŸ¥é˜…ã€‚ ### é‡è¦çš„äº‹æƒ…è¯´3éï¼š ğŸ‘‡ğŸ‘‡ğŸ‘‡ğŸ‘‡ğŸ‘‡ğŸ‘‡ğŸ‘‡ğŸ‘‡ğŸ‘‡ğŸ‘‡ğŸ‘‡ ğŸ‘‰ 1.[https://newpanjing.github.io/simpleui_docs/](https://newpanjing.github.io/simpleui_docs/)ğŸ‘ˆ ğŸ‘‰ 2.[https://newpanjing.github.io/simpleui_docs/](https://newpanjing.github.io/simpleui_docs/)ğŸ‘ˆ ğŸ‘‰ 3.[https://newpanjing.github.io/simpleui_docs/](https://newpanjing.github.io/simpleui_docs/)ğŸ‘ˆ ğŸ‘†ğŸ‘†ğŸ‘†ğŸ‘†ğŸ‘†ğŸ‘†ğŸ‘†ğŸ‘†ğŸ‘†ğŸ‘†ğŸ‘† ## æœ¬åœ°Demoä¸‹è½½ å¦‚æœä½ æ²¡æœ‰ä»»ä½•python djangoåŸºç¡€ï¼Œå¯ä»¥ä¸‹è½½ä¸€ä¸ªå¯ä»¥ç›´æ¥è¿è¡Œçš„demoè¿›è¡Œä½“éªŒã€‚ [ğŸ˜DEMOæºç ](https://github.com/newpanjing/simpleui_demo) ## Docker ```shell docker pull newpanjing/simpleui_demo docker run -p 8080:8080 newpanjing/simpleui_demo ``` å¯åŠ¨æˆåŠŸåè®¿é—®ï¼šhttp://127.0.0.1:8080 # simpleui æ˜¯ä»€ä¹ˆï¼Ÿ ğŸš€simpleui æ˜¯django adminçš„ä¸€ä¸ªä¸»é¢˜ æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªåŸºäºelement-ui+vueå¼€å‘ï¼Œé‡å†™å’Œä¼˜åŒ–90%ä»¥ä¸Šçš„é¡µé¢ã€‚ ä¸suitæ˜¯åŒç±»äº§å“ã€‚æˆ‘ä»¬æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªæ›´ç¬¦åˆå›½äººå®¡ç¾å’Œä½¿ç”¨ä¹ æƒ¯çš„ä¸€ä¸ªä¸»é¢˜ã€‚ # å¼€å§‹ä½¿ç”¨ è¯¦ç»†æ­¥éª¤è¯·æµè§ˆ [ä½¿ç”¨æ–‡æ¡£](https://newpanjing.github.io/simpleui_docs/config.html)ã€‚ ä¹Ÿå¯ä»¥å‚è€ƒ[Demo](#åœ¨çº¿Demo) + å®‰è£… ```python pip install django-simpleui ``` ç”¨pipæˆ–è€…[æºç æ–¹å¼](#å…‹éš†æºç æœ¬åœ°å®‰è£…)å®‰è£…simpleuiåï¼Œåœ¨è‡ªå·±é¡¹ç›®çš„settings.pyæ–‡ä»¶ä¸­INSTALLED_APPSçš„ç¬¬ä¸€è¡ŒåŠ å…¥`simpleui` ä¸¾ä¸ªä¾‹å­ğŸŒ°ï¼š ```python # Application definition INSTALLED_APPS = [ 'simpleui', 'django.contrib.admin', 'django.contrib.auth', 'django.contrib.contenttypes', 'django.contrib.sessions', 'django.contrib.messages', 'django.contrib.staticfiles', ... ] ``` å¦‚æœä¸çŸ¥é“æ€ä¹ˆé…ç½®æˆ–è€…å¦‚ä½•ä½¿ç”¨ï¼Œè¯·ä¸‹è½½[æœ¬åœ°demo](#æœ¬åœ°Demoä¸‹è½½)è¿›è¡Œå­¦ä¹ ã€‚æˆ–è€…åŠ å…¥QQç¾¤ï¼š786576510 å’¨è¯¢ã€‚ # å‡çº§simpleui ```python pip install django-simpleui --upgrade ``` # å…‹éš†æºç æœ¬åœ°å®‰è£… ```shell git clone https://github.com/newpanjing/simpleui cd simpleui python setup.py sdist install ``` ## å¸¸è§é—®é¢˜: 1. å¦‚æœå…³é—­debugæ¨¡å¼åï¼Œè¯·æ‰§è¡Œä»¥ä¸‹å‘½ä»¤å°†simpleuié™æ€æ–‡ä»¶é™æ€æ–‡ä»¶å…‹éš†åˆ°æ ¹ç›®å½• ```shell python3 manage.py collectstatic ``` 2. å…‹éš†é™æ€æ–‡ä»¶å‡ºé”™ è¯·åœ¨settings.pyæ–‡ä»¶ä¸­åŠ å…¥ï¼š ```shell STATIC_ROOT = os.path.join(BASE_DIR, "static") ``` 3. å…¶ä»–é—®é¢˜è¯·å‚è€ƒ[djangoå®˜æ–¹æ–‡æ¡£](https://docs.djangoproject.com/zh-hans/2.2/)ã€‚ 4. i18n å›½é™…åŒ– é‡‡ç”¨jså›½é™…åŒ–ï¼Œé»˜è®¤ä¸ºè‹±æ–‡å’Œä¸­æ–‡ä¸¤ç§è¯­è¨€ï¼Œéšç³»ç»Ÿåˆ‡æ¢ã€‚å…·ä½“è¯·çœ‹[å›½é™…åŒ–é…ç½®](/i18n.md) å…¶ä»–é—®é¢˜è¯·æŸ¥çœ‹[å¿«é€Ÿä¸Šæ‰‹æŒ‡å—](./QUICK.md) ## æ”¯æŒdjangoå’Œpythonç‰ˆæœ¬ [æŸ¥çœ‹æ”¯æŒçš„ç‰ˆæœ¬åˆ—è¡¨](/VERSION.md) ## æµè§ˆå™¨å…¼å®¹æ€§ ![Chrome](https://raw.github.com/alrra/browser-logos/master/src/chrome/chrome_48x48.png) | ![Firefox](https://raw.github.com/alrra/browser-logos/master/src/firefox/firefox_48x48.png) | ![Edge](https://raw.github.com/alrra/browser-logos/master/src/edge/edge_48x48.png) | ![IE](https://raw.github.com/alrra/browser-logos/master/src/archive/internet-explorer_9-11/internet-explorer_9-11_48x48.png) | ![Safari](https://raw.github.com/alrra/browser-logos/master/src/safari/safari_48x48.png) | ![Opera](https://raw.github.com/alrra/browser-logos/master/src/opera/opera_48x48.png) | ![UC](https://raw.github.com/alrra/browser-logos/master/src/uc/uc_48x48.png) :---: | :---: | :---: | :---: | :---: | :---: | :---: âœ” | âœ” | âœ” | 11+ âœ” | âœ” | âœ” | âœ” ## README å¾½ç«  å¦‚æœä½ çš„é¡¹ç›®æ­£åœ¨ä½¿ç”¨Simpleuiï¼Œå¯ä»¥å°†Simpleuiå¾½ç«  [![ice](https://img.shields.io/badge/developing%20with-Simpleui-2077ff.svg)](https://github.com/newpanjing/simpleui) æ·»åŠ åˆ°ä½ çš„ README ä¸­ï¼š ``` [![simpleui](https://img.shields.io/badge/developing%20with-Simpleui-2077ff.svg)](https://github.com/newpanjing/simpleui) ``` ## èµåŠ©ğŸ’° å¦‚æœä½ è§‰å¾—simpleuiå¯¹ä½ æœ‰å¸®åŠ©ï¼Œä½ å¯ä»¥èµåŠ©æˆ‘ä»¬ä¸€æ¯å’–å•¡ï¼Œé¼“åŠ±æˆ‘ä»¬ç»§ç»­å¼€å‘ç»´æŠ¤ä¸‹å»ã€‚ ![æ‰«ç èµåŠ©](https://github.com/newpanjing/simpleui/raw/master/images/pay.png) # ç™»å½•é¡µ ![](https://github.com/newpanjing/simpleui/raw/master/images/%E7%99%BB%E5%BD%95%E7%95%8C%E9%9D%A2.png) # ä¸»é¡µ ![](https://github.com/newpanjing/simpleui/raw/master/images/%E4%B8%BB%E9%A1%B5.png) # åˆ—è¡¨é¡µ ![](https://github.com/newpanjing/simpleui/raw/master/images/%E5%88%97%E8%A1%A8%E9%A1%B5.png) ![](https://github.com/newpanjing/simpleui/raw/master/images/%E6%95%B0%E6%8D%AE%E9%A1%B5.png) # åˆ‡æ¢ä¸»é¢˜ ![](https://github.com/newpanjing/simpleui/raw/master/images/%E5%88%87%E6%8D%A2%E4%B8%BB%E9%A2%98.png) # å¯†ç ä¿®æ”¹ ![](https://github.com/newpanjing/simpleui/raw/master/images/%E5%AF%86%E7%A0%81%E4%BF%AE%E6%94%B9.png) # ç¼–è¾‘é¡µ ![](https://github.com/newpanjing/simpleui/raw/master/images/%E7%BC%96%E8%BE%91%E9%A1%B5.png) # è®¾ç½®å­—ä½“å¤§å° ![](https://github.com/newpanjing/simpleui/raw/master/images/%E8%AE%BE%E7%BD%AE%E5%AD%97%E4%BD%93%E5%A4%A7%E5%B0%8F.png) ## ä¼˜è´¨è´¡çŒ®è€… simpleuiçš„å‘å±•ç¦»ä¸å¼€ä»¥ä¸‹ä¼˜ç§€è´¡çŒ®è€…çš„æ”¯æŒã€‚å¦‚æœæ‚¨æƒ³ä¸ºsimpleuiè´¡çŒ®ä»£ç ï¼Œè¯·forkåˆ°è‡ªå·±ä»“åº“ï¼Œç„¶åå‘èµ·åˆå¹¶è¯·æ±‚ï¼Œåˆå¹¶è‡³devåˆ†æ”¯ã€‚ |Github|è´¡çŒ®èŒƒå›´| |------|------| |[@Abraverman666](https://github.com/Abraverman666)|Developers| |[@zhangzhibo1014](https://github.com/zhangzhibo1014)|è‹±æ–‡æ–‡æ¡£ç¿»è¯‘| |[@liaogx](https://github.com/liaogx)|bugä¿®å¤| |[@shouyong](https://github.com/shouyong)|bugä¿®å¤| |[@Roddy1219](https://github.com/Roddy1219)|bugä¿®å¤| |[@WalkerWang731](https://github.com/WalkerWang731)|ä¼˜è´¨ä»£ç è´¡çŒ®| |[@åˆå­¦è€…](https://www.seejoke.com)|223450427@qq.comï¼Œé¡¶çº§æŠ€æœ¯é¡¾é—®| ## å…¶ä»–é¡¹ç›® åŸºäºSimpleUI æ‰“é€ çš„ä¸“ä¸šç‰ˆï¼š[Simple Pro](https://www.mldoo.com/simplepro) åŸºäºvue3å’Œelement-plus æ‰“é€ çš„çº¯å‰ç«¯Adminï¼š [Simple Admin](https://github.com/newpanjing/simple-admin)

files.name: RELEASE.sh
files.content:
#!/usr/bin/env zsh
echo 'release django-simpleui...'
rm -rf dist/*
python3 setup.py sdist
twine upload dist/*

echo 'release django-simpleui success.'

echo 'release simpleui...'
rm -rf dist/*
python3 setup2.py sdist
twine upload dist/*

echo 'release simpleui success.'

files.name: setup.py
files.content:
# -*- coding: utf-8 -*-
import sys

from setuptools import setup
import simpleui

if sys.version_info < (3, 0):

    long_description = "\n".join([
        open('README.rst', 'r').read(),
    ])
else:
    long_description = "\n".join([
        open('README.rst', 'r', encoding='utf-8').read(),
    ])

setup(
    name='django-simpleui',
    version=simpleui.get_version(),
    packages=['simpleui'],
    zip_safe=False,
    include_package_data=True,
    url='https://github.com/newpanjing/simpleui',
    license='Apache License 2.0',
    author='panjing',
    long_description=long_description,
    author_email='newpanjing@icloud.com',
    description='django admin theme åå°æ¨¡æ¿',
    install_requires=['django'],
    classifiers=[
        "Programming Language :: Python :: 3",
        "Operating System :: OS Independent",
    ],
)

files.name: setup2.py
files.content:
# -*- coding: utf-8 -*-
import sys

from setuptools import setup
import simpleui

if sys.version_info < (3, 0):

    long_description = "\n".join([
        open('README.rst', 'r').read(),
    ])
else:
    long_description = "\n".join([
        open('README.rst', 'r', encoding='utf-8').read(),
    ])

setup(
    name='simpleui',
    version=simpleui.get_version(),
    packages=['simpleui'],
    zip_safe=False,
    include_package_data=True,
    url='https://github.com/newpanjing/simpleui',
    license='Apache License 2.0',
    author='panjing',
    long_description=long_description,
    author_email='newpanjing@icloud.com',
    description='django admin theme åå°æ¨¡æ¿',
    install_requires=['django'],
    classifiers=[
        "Programming Language :: Python :: 3",
        "Operating System :: OS Independent",
    ],
)
